logmessage.name: INVALID_SP
logmessage.description: Invalid Service Provider Identifier

actions.item: Check the Service Provider Name.

logmessage.name: INVALID_IDP
logmessage.description: Invalid Identity Provider Identifier

actions.item: Check the Identity Provider Name.

logmessage.name: SP_METADATA_ERROR
logmessage.description: Unable to retreive Service Provider Metadata.

actions.item: Check the Data Store is accessible .
Check the Realm name.
Check the Service Provider Entity Identifier.

logmessage.name: IDP_METADATA_ERROR
logmessage.description: Unable to retrieve Identity Provider Metadata.

actions.item: Check the Data Store is accessible .
Check the Realm name.
Check the Identity Provider Entity Identifier.

logmessage.name: SSO_NOT_FOUND
logmessage.description: Unable to retrieve SingleSignOnService URL.

actions.item: Check the Data Store is accessible .
Check the Realm name.
Check the Identity Provider Entity Identifier.

logmessage.name: REDIRECT_TO_SP
logmessage.description: Redirecting to SingleSignOnService

triggers.item: Sending Authentication Request by redirecting to Single SignOn Service URL.

logmessage.name: RESPONSE_NOT_FOUND_FROM_CACHE
logmessage.description: Unable to retrieve Response using Response ID after local login.

triggers.item: Response doesn't exist in the SP cache.

actions.item: Check the SP cache clean up interval configuration.

logmessage.name: MISSING_ARTIFACT
logmessage.description: Unable to retrieve Artifact from HTTP Request.

triggers.item: SAMLart is missing from HTTP Request

actions.item: Check with sender.
Check web container server log.

logmessage.name: RECEIVED_ARTIFACT
logmessage.description: Received Artifact from HTTP Request.

triggers.item: Received Artifact from HTTP Request in the process of Single Sign On using Artifact Profile.

logmessage.name: IDP_NOT_FOUND
logmessage.description: Unable to find Identity Provider Entity ID based on the SourceID in Artifact.

triggers.item: No matching Identity Provider Entity ID found in meta data configuration.

actions.item: Check if Identity Provider's meta data is loaded.

logmessage.name: IDP_META_NOT_FOUND
logmessage.description: Unable to load Identity Provider's meta data.

triggers.item: Unable to load Identity Provider's meta data.

actions.item: Check Identity Provider Entity ID.
Check Realm or organization name.
Check if the identity provider's meta is loaded.

logmessage.name: ARTIFACT_RESOLUTION_URL_NOT_FOUND
logmessage.description: Unable to find Identity Provider's Artifact resolution service URL.

triggers.item: Artifact resolution service URL is not defined in Identity Provider's metadata.

actions.item: Check Identity Provider's meta data.

logmessage.name: CANNOT_CREATE_ARTIFACT_RESOLVE
logmessage.description: Unable to create ArtifactResolve.

actions.item: Check implementation of ArtifactResolve.

logmessage.name: CANNOT_GET_SOAP_RESPONSE
logmessage.description: Unable to obtain response from SOAP communication with Identity Provider's artifact resolution service.

datainfo.item: Identity Provider's Artifact Resolution Service URL

actions.item: Check Identity Provider's Artifact Resolution Service URL.
Check SOAP message authentication requirements for Identity Provider's Artifact Resolution Service.

logmessage.name: GOT_RESPONSE_FROM_ARTIFACT
logmessage.description: Obtained response using artifact profile.

datainfo.item: Response xml String if the log level was set to LL_FINE at run time

triggers.item: Single Sign On using Artifact Profile.

logmessage.name: SOAP_ERROR
logmessage.description: Unable to obtain Artifact Response due to SOAP error.

actions.item: Check configuration for Identity Provider

logmessage.name: SOAP_FAULT
logmessage.description: Received SOAP Fault instead of Artifact Response.

triggers.item: Error in Identity Provider's Artifact Resolution.

actions.item: Check Identity Provider
Check debug file for detailed fault info.

logmessage.name: TOO_MANY_ARTIFACT_RESPONSE
logmessage.description: Received too many Artifact Response.

triggers.item: Identity Provider sent more than one Artifact Response in SOAPMessage.

actions.item: Check Identity Provider

logmessage.name: CANNOT_INSTANTIATE_ARTIFACT_RESPONSE
logmessage.description: Unable to instantiate Artifact Response.

actions.item: Check Identity Provider
Check debug message for detailed error.

logmessage.name: MISSING_ARTIFACT_RESPONSE
logmessage.description: Unable to obtain Artifact Response from SOAP message.

triggers.item: No ArtifactResponse is included in SOAPMessage.

actions.item: Check Identity Provider

logmessage.name: ARTIFACT_RESPONSE_INVALID_SIGNATURE
logmessage.description: Unable to verify signature on Artifact Response.

triggers.item: Error while trying to verify signature on ArtifactResponse.

actions.item: Check configuration for Identity Provider
Check debug file for detailed info

logmessage.name: ARTIFACT_RESPONSE_INVALID_INRESPONSETO
logmessage.description: Invalid InResponseTo attribute in Artifact Response.

triggers.item: InResponseTo attribute in Artifact Response is missing or doesn't match with Artifact Resolve ID.

actions.item: Check with Identity Provider

logmessage.name: ARTIFACT_RESPONSE_INVALID_ISSUER
logmessage.description: Invalid Issuer in Artifact Response.

triggers.item: Issuer in Artifact Response is missing or doesn't match with Identity Provider Entity ID.

actions.item: Check with Identity Provider

logmessage.name: ARTIFACT_RESPONSE_INVALID_STATUS_CODE
logmessage.description: Invalid status code in Artifact Response.

datainfo.item: Status code if the log level was set to LL_FINE at runtime

triggers.item: Status in Artifact Response is missing or status code is not Success.

actions.item: Check with Identity Provider

logmessage.name: CANNOT_INSTANTIATE_RESPONSE_ARTIFACT
logmessage.description: Unable to instantiate Respones from Artifact Response.

actions.item: Check debug file for detailed error.

logmessage.name: MISSING_SAML_RESPONSE_FROM_POST
logmessage.description: SAML Response is missing from http post.

triggers.item: Parameter SAMLResponse is missing from http POST.

logmessage.name: CANNOT_INSTANTIATE_RESPONSE_POST
logmessage.description: Unable to instantiate Response from POST.

actions.item: Check debug file for more info

logmessage.name: CANNOT_DECODE_RESPONSE
logmessage.description: Unable to decode Response.

actions.item: Check debug file for more info

logmessage.name: GOT_RESPONSE_FROM_POST
logmessage.description: Obtained response using POST profile.

datainfo.item: Response xml String if the log level was set to LL_FINE at runtime

triggers.item: Single Sign On using POST Profile.

logmessage.name: FED_INFO_WRITTEN
logmessage.description: Written federation info.

datainfo.item: NameIDInfo value string if the log level was set to LL_FINE at runtime

logmessage.name: REDIRECT_TO_IDP
logmessage.description: Redirect request to IDP.

logmessage.name: NO_ACS_URL
logmessage.description: Unable to find Assertion Consumer Service URL.

logmessage.name: NO_RETURN_BINDING
logmessage.description: Unable to find return binding.

logmessage.name: POST_TO_TARGET_FAILED
logmessage.description: Unable to post the response to target.

triggers.item: Single Sign On with POST binding.

logmessage.name: CANNOT_CREATE_ARTIFACT
logmessage.description: Unable to create an artifact.

triggers.item: Single Sign On with Artifact binding.

logmessage.name: RECEIVED_AUTHN_REQUEST
logmessage.description: Received AuthnRequest.

logmessage.name: POST_RESPONSE
logmessage.description: Post response to SP.

triggers.item: Single Sign On with POST binding.

logmessage.name: SEND_ARTIFACT
logmessage.description: Send an artifact to SP.

triggers.item: Single Sign On with Artifact binding.

logmessage.name: INVALID_SOAP_MESSAGE
logmessage.description: Encounter invalid SOAP message in IDP.

triggers.item: Single Sign On with Artifact binding.

logmessage.name: ARTIFACT_RESPONSE
logmessage.description: The artifact response being sent to SP.

triggers.item: Single Sign On with Artifact binding.

logmessage.name: GOT_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR
logmessage.description: Entity descriptor obtained.

logmessage.name: INVALID_REALM_GET_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR
logmessage.description: Invaid realm while getting entity descriptor.

actions.item: Check the Realm name.

logmessage.name: GOT_INVALID_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR
logmessage.description: Obtained invalid entity descriptor.

actions.item: Delete invalid entity descriptor and import it again.

logmessage.name: CONFIG_ERROR_GET_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR
logmessage.description: Configuration error while getting entity descriptor.

actions.item: Check debug message for detailed error.

logmessage.name: NO_ENTITY_ID_SET_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR
logmessage.description: No entity ID while setting entity descriptor.

actions.item: Set entity ID in entity descriptor.

logmessage.name: INVALID_REALM_SET_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR
logmessage.description: Invaid realm while setting entity descriptor.

actions.item: Check the Realm name.

logmessage.name: NO_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR_SET_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR
logmessage.description: Entity descriptor doesn't exist while setting entity descriptor.

actions.item: Create entity descriptor before set.

logmessage.name: SET_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR
logmessage.description: Entity descriptor was set.

logmessage.name: CONFIG_ERROR_SET_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR
logmessage.description: Configuration error while setting entity descriptor.

actions.item: Check debug message for detailed error.

logmessage.name: SET_INVALID_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR
logmessage.description: Invalid entity descriptor to set.

actions.item: Check entity descriptor if it follows the schema.

logmessage.name: NO_ENTITY_ID_CREATE_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR
logmessage.description: No entity ID while creating entity descriptor.

actions.item: Set entity ID in entity descriptor.

logmessage.name: INVALID_REALM_CREATE_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR
logmessage.description: Invaid realm while creating entity descriptor.

actions.item: Check the Realm name.

logmessage.name: ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR_EXISTS
logmessage.description: Entity descriptor exists while creating entity descriptor.

actions.item: Delete existing entity descriptor first.

logmessage.name: ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR_CREATED
logmessage.description: Entity descriptor was created.

logmessage.name: CONFIG_ERROR_CREATE_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR
logmessage.description: Configuration error while creating entity descriptor.

actions.item: Check debug message for detailed error.

logmessage.name: CREATE_INVALID_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR
logmessage.description: Invalid entity descriptor to create.

actions.item: Check entity descriptor if it follows the schema.

logmessage.name: INVALID_REALM_DELETE_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR
logmessage.description: Invaid realm while deleting entity descriptor.

actions.item: Check the Realm name.

logmessage.name: NO_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR_DELETE_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR
logmessage.description: Entity descriptor doesn't exist while deleting entity descriptor.

logmessage.name: ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR_DELETED
logmessage.description: Entity descriptor was deleted.

logmessage.name: CONFIG_ERROR_DELETE_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR
logmessage.description: Configuration error while deleting entity descriptor.

actions.item: Check debug message for detailed error.

logmessage.name: GOT_ENTITY_CONFIG
logmessage.description: Entity config obtained.

logmessage.name: INVALID_REALM_GET_ENTITY_CONFIG
logmessage.description: Invaid realm while getting entity config.

actions.item: Check the Realm name.

logmessage.name: GOT_INVALID_ENTITY_CONFIG
logmessage.description: Obtained invalid entity config.

actions.item: Delete invalid entity config and import it again.

logmessage.name: CONFIG_ERROR_GET_ENTITY_CONFIG
logmessage.description: Configuration error while getting entity config.

actions.item: Check debug message for detailed error.

logmessage.name: NO_ENTITY_ID_SET_ENTITY_CONFIG
logmessage.description: No entity ID while setting entity config.

actions.item: Set entity ID in entity config.

logmessage.name: INVALID_REALM_SET_ENTITY_CONFIG
logmessage.description: Invaid realm while setting entity config.

actions.item: Check the Realm name.

logmessage.name: NO_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR_SET_ENTITY_CONFIG
logmessage.description: Entity config doesn't exist while setting entity config.

actions.item: Create entity descriptor before set entity config.

logmessage.name: SET_ENTITY_CONFIG
logmessage.description: Entity config was set.

logmessage.name: CONFIG_ERROR_SET_ENTITY_CONFIG
logmessage.description: Configuration error while setting entity config.

actions.item: Check debug message for detailed error.

logmessage.name: SET_INVALID_ENTITY_CONFIG
logmessage.description: Invalid entity config to set.

actions.item: Check entity config if it follows the schema.

logmessage.name: NO_ENTITY_ID_CREATE_ENTITY_CONFIG
logmessage.description: No entity ID while creating entity config.

actions.item: Set entity ID in entity config.

logmessage.name: INVALID_REALM_CREATE_ENTITY_CONFIG
logmessage.description: Invaid realm while creating entity config.

actions.item: Check the Realm name.

logmessage.name: NO_ENTITY_DESCRIPTOR_CREATE_ENTITY_CONFIG
logmessage.description: Entity config doesn't exist while creating entity config.

actions.item: Create entity descriptor before create entity config.

logmessage.name: ENTITY_CONFIG_EXISTS
logmessage.description: Entity config exists while creating entity config.

actions.item: Delete existing entity config first.

logmessage.name: ENTITY_CONFIG_CREATED
logmessage.description: Entity config was created.

logmessage.name: CONFIG_ERROR_CREATE_ENTITY_CONFIG
logmessage.description: Configuration error while creating entity config.

actions.item: Check debug message for detailed error.

logmessage.name: CREATE_INVALID_ENTITY_CONFIG
logmessage.description: Invalid entity config to create.

actions.item: Check entity config if it follows the schema.

logmessage.name: INVALID_REALM_DELETE_ENTITY_CONFIG
logmessage.description: Invaid realm while deleting entity config.

actions.item: Check the Realm name.

logmessage.description: Entity config doesn't exist while deleting entity config.

actions.item: Check debug message for detailed error.

logmessage.description: Entity config was deleted.

logmessage.name: CONFIG_ERROR_DELETE_ENTITY_CONFIG

actions.item: Check debug message for detailed error.

logmessage.name: INVALID_REALM_GET_ALL_HOSTED_ENTITIES
logmessage.description: Invaid realm while getting all hosted entities.

actions.item: Check the Realm name.

logmessage.name: CONFIG_ERROR_GET_ALL_HOSTED_ENTITIES
logmessage.description: Configuration error while getting all hosted entities.

actions.item: Check debug message for detailed error.

logmessage.name: GOT_ALL_HOSTED_ENTITIES
logmessage.description: Obtained all hosted entities.

logmessage.name: INVALID_REALM_GET_ALL_REMOTE_ENTITIES
logmessage.description: Invaid realm while getting all remote entities.

actions.item: Check the Realm name.

logmessage.name: CONFIG_ERROR_GET_ALL_REMOTE_ENTITIES
logmessage.description: Configuration error while getting all remote entities.

actions.item: Check debug message for detailed error.

logmessage.name: GOT_ALL_REMOTE_ENTITIES
logmessage.description: Obtained all remote entities.

logmessage.name: INVALID_INRESPONSETO_RESPONSE
logmessage.description: InResponseTo attribute in Response is invalid.

triggers.item: Service Provider received a Response for Single Sign On.

actions.item: Check debug message for detailed error.

logmessage.name: INVALID_ISSUER_RESPONSE
logmessage.description: Issuer in Response is invalid.

triggers.item: Issuer in Response is not configured or not trusted by the hosted provider

actions.item: Check configuration.

logmessage.name: WRONG_STATUS_CODE
logmessage.description: Status code in Response was not Success.

datainfo.item: Status code (if log level is set to LL_FINE)

triggers.item: Service provider received a Response with wrong Status code. Most likely an error occurred at Identity Provider.

actions.item: Check the status code. Contact Identity Provider if needed.

logmessage.name: ASSERTION_NOT_ENCRYPTED
logmessage.description: Assertion in Response was not encrypted.

triggers.item: Service provider requested the assertion in Response to be encrypted, but it received a Response with unencrypted assertion(s).

actions.item: Check configuration. Notify Identity Provider regarding the requirement.

logmessage.name: MISSING_ASSERTION
logmessage.description: Response had no Assertion.

triggers.item: Service provider received a Response for Single Sign On, but the response contained no Assertion.

actions.item: Check error code of the Response. Notify Identity Provider if needed.

logmessage.name: INVALID_ISSUER_ASSERTION
logmessage.description: Issuer in Assertion is not valid.

triggers.item: Issuer in Assertion for single sign on was not configured at service provider, or not trusted by the service provider.

actions.item: Check configuration

logmessage.name: MISMATCH_ISSUER_ASSERTION
logmessage.description: Issuer in Assertion didn't match the Issuer in Response or other Assertions in the Response.

triggers.item: Service provider received Response which had mismatch Issuer inside the Assertion it contained.

actions.item: Check debug message

logmessage.name: INVALID_SIGNATURE_ASSERTION
logmessage.description: Assertion is not signed or signature is not valid.

triggers.item: Service provider requested the Assertion to be signed but the assertion received was not; or the signature on the Assertion received was not valid.

actions.item: Check configuration; check debug for more detailed error message.

logmessage.name: MISSING_SUBJECT_COMFIRMATION_DATA
logmessage.description: SubjectConfirmationData had no Subject.

triggers.item: Service provider received an Assertion whose SubjectConfirmationData had no Subject.

actions.item: Check debug for the Assertion received. Contact Identity Provider if needed.

logmessage.name: MISSING_RECIPIENT
logmessage.description: SubjectConfirmationData had no Recipient.

triggers.item: Service provider received an Assertion whose SubjectConfirmationData had no Recipient.

actions.item: Check debug for the Assertion received. Contact Identity Provider if needed.

logmessage.name: WRONG_RECIPIENT
logmessage.description: Service Provider is not the intended recipient.

triggers.item: Service provider received an Assertion. But the provider is not the intended recipient of the Assertion.

actions.item: Check debug for the Assertion received. Check meta data. Contact Identity Provider if needed.

logmessage.name: INVALID_TIME_SUBJECT_CONFIRMATION_DATA
logmessage.description: Time in SubjectConfirmationData of the Assertion is invalid.

triggers.item: The assertion service provider received had expired timewise.

actions.item: Synchronize the time between service provider and identity provider. Increase the time skew attribute for the service provider in its entity config.

logmessage.name: CONTAINED_NOT_BEFORE
logmessage.description: SubjectConfirmationData of the Assertion had NotBefore.

triggers.item: The assertion service provider received had NotBefore.

actions.item: Check debug for the Assertion received. Contact identity provider if needed.

logmessage.name: WRONG_INRESPONSETO_ASSERTION
logmessage.description: Assertion contained wrong InResponseTo attribute.

triggers.item: InResponseTo in Assertion is different from the one in Response. Or Assertion didn't contain InResponseTo, but Response did.

actions.item: Check debug for the Assertion received. Contact identity provider if needed.

logmessage.name: MISSING_CONDITIONS
logmessage.description: Assertion contained no Conditions.

triggers.item: Conditions is missing from the Single Sign On Assertion.

actions.item: Check debug for the Assertion received. Contact identity provider if needed.

logmessage.name: MISSING_AUDIENCE_RESTRICTION
logmessage.description: Assertion contained no AudienceRestriction.

triggers.item: AudienceRestriction is missing from the Single Sign On Assertion.

actions.item: Check debug for the Assertion received. Contact identity provider if needed.

logmessage.name: WRONG_AUDIENCE
logmessage.description: Assertion contained wrong Audience.

triggers.item: This service provider was not the intended audience of the single sign on assertion.

actions.item: Check debug for the Assertion received. Check meta data. Contact identity provider if needed.

logmessage.name: FOUND_AUTHN_ASSERTION
logmessage.description: Found authentication assertion in the Response.

datainfo.item: Subject if the log level was set to LL_FINE

triggers.item: Both the Response and Assertion(s) inside the Response are valid.

logmessage.name: INVALID_SSOTOKEN
logmessage.description: Invalid SSOToken found in Request.

logmessage.name: MISSING_ENTITY
logmessage.description: No entity ID is specified in Request.

actions.item: Specify EntityID parameter in request URL.

logmessage.name: MISSING_META_ALIAS
logmessage.description: No metaAlias is specified in Request.

actions.item: Specify metaAlias parameter in request URL.

logmessage.name: REDIRECT_TO_AUTH
logmessage.description: Redirect request to authentication page.

logmessage.name: CANNOT_DECODE_REQUEST
logmessage.description: Can not decode URL encoded Query parameter.

triggers.item: Initiate to decode incorrectly URL encoded Query parameter.

logmessage.name: CANNOT_INSTANTIATE_MNI_RESPONSE
logmessage.description: Can not instantiate MNI Response with input xml.

datainfo.item: Input XML string for MNI Response

triggers.item: Initiate parse MNI Response with incorrect XML string.

logmessage.name: CANNOT_INSTANTIATE_MNI_REQUEST
logmessage.description: Can not instantiate MNI Request with input XML.

datainfo.item: Input XML string for MNI Request

triggers.item: Initiate parse MNI Request with incorrect XML string.

logmessage.name: CANNOT_INSTANTIATE_SLO_RESPONSE
logmessage.description: Can not instantiate SLO Response with input XML.

datainfo.item: Input XML string for SLO Response

triggers.item: Initiate parse SLO Response with incorrect XML string.

logmessage.name: CANNOT_INSTANTIATE_SLO_REQUEST
logmessage.description: Can not instantiate SLO Request with input XML.

datainfo.item: Input XML string for SLO Request

triggers.item: Initiate parse SLO Request with incorrect XML string.

logmessage.name: MNI_REQUEST_INVALID_SIGNATURE
logmessage.description: Can not varify signature in MNI Request.

triggers.item: Sinature in MNI Request is incorrect.

logmessage.name: MNI_RESPONSE_INVALID_SIGNATURE
logmessage.description: Can not valify signature in MNI Response.

triggers.item: Sinature in MNI Response is incorrect.

logmessage.name: SLO_REQUEST_INVALID_SIGNATURE
logmessage.description: Can not valify signature in SLO Request.

triggers.item: Sinature in SLO Request is incorrect.

logmessage.name: SLO_RESPONSE_INVALID_SIGNATURE
logmessage.description: Can not valify signature in SLO Response.

triggers.item: Sinature in SLO Response is incorrect.

logmessage.name: NAMEID_INVALID_ENCRYPTION
logmessage.description: Can not decrypt EncryptedID.

logmessage.name: INVALID_MNI_RESPONSE
logmessage.description: MNI Response has error status.

logmessage.name: INVALID_SLO_RESPONSE
logmessage.description: SLO Response has error status.

logmessage.name: MISSING_ENTITY_ROLE
logmessage.description: Entity Role is not specified in the request.

actions.item: Specify Entity Role parameter in the request.

logmessage.name: INVALID_ISSUER_REQUEST
logmessage.description: Issuer in Request is invalid.

triggers.item: Issuer in Request is not configured or not trusted by the hosted provider

actions.item: Check configuration.

logmessage.name: INVALID_REALM_GET_ALL_ENTITIES
logmessage.description: Invaid realm while getting all entities.

actions.item: Check the Realm name.

logmessage.name: CONFIG_ERROR_GET_ALL_ENTITIES
logmessage.description: Configuration error while getting all entities.

actions.item: Check debug message for detailed error.

logmessage.name: GOT_ALL_ENTITIES
logmessage.description: Obtained all entities.

logmessage.name: INVALID_PEP_ID
logmessage.description: Invalid Policy Enforcement Point (PEP) Identifier.

actions.item: Provide valid PEP Identifier and retry.

logmessage.name: INVALID_PDP_ID
logmessage.description: Invalid Policy Decision Point (PDP) Identifier.

actions.item: Provide valid PDP Identifier and retry.

logmessage.name: NULL_PDP_SIGN_CERT_ALIAS
logmessage.description: Certificate Alias is null, cannot sign the message.

datainfo.item: The realm from which the metadata was retreived.
Entity Identifier for the Policy Decision Point.

actions.item: Check the entity's metadata to verify the certificate alias is correct.

logmessage.name: NULL_PEP_SIGN_CERT_ALIAS
logmessage.description: Certificate Alias is null,cannot retreive the certificate.

datainfo.item: The realm from which the metadata was retreived.
Entity Identifier for the Policy Enforcement Point.

triggers.item: Cannot validate the signature in the request message.

actions.item: Check the entity's metadata to verify the certificate alias is correct.

logmessage.name: INVALID_SIGNATURE_QUERY
logmessage.description: Invalid Signature in Query Request.

datainfo.item: The realm from which the metadata was retreived.
Entity Identifier for the Policy Decision Point.
Cert Alias used to retrieve certificate from keystore.

triggers.item: Cannot process the request, server will send back error to the Requester.

actions.item: Check the entity's metadata to verify the certificate alias is correct.
Check the certificate in the keystore for its existance and validity.

logmessage.name: INVALID_ISSUER_IN_PEP_REQUEST
logmessage.description: Issuer in Request is invalid.

triggers.item: Issuer in Request is not configured or not trusted by the hosted provider therefore Query will fail.

actions.item: Check the hosted entity configuration attribute cotlist to make sure the issuer identifier is in the list.

logmessage.name: PEP_METADATA_ERROR
logmessage.description: Unable to retreive Policy Enforcement Point (PEP) Metadata.

actions.item: Check the Data Store is accessible .
Check the PEP Provider Entity Identifier.

logmessage.name: PDP_METADATA_ERROR
logmessage.description: Unable to retrieve Policy Decision Point (PDP) Metadata.

actions.item: Check the Data Store is accessible .
Check the PDP Provider Entity Identifier.

logmessage.name: ASSERTION_FROM_PDP_NOT_ENCRYPTED
logmessage.description: Assertion in Response not encrypted.

triggers.item: Policy Enforcement Point (PEP) Provider requested the assertion in Response to be encrypted, but it received a Response with unencrypted assertion(s).

actions.item: Check PEP metadata published to the PDP. Notify Policy Decision Point (PDP) Provider regarding the requirement.

logmessage.name: MISSING_ASSERTION_IN_PDP_RESPONSE
logmessage.description: Response has no Assertion.

triggers.item: Policy Enforcement Point (PEP) Provider received a Response with no Assertion.

actions.item: Check error code of the Response. Notify Policy Decision Point (PDP) Provider to check for errors or possible misconfiguration.

logmessage.name: INVALID_ISSUER_IN_ASSERTION_FROM_PDP
logmessage.description: Issuer in Assertion is not valid.

triggers.item: Issuer in Assertion was not configured at Policy Enforcement Point (PEP) provider, or not trusted by the PEP provider.

actions.item: Check the configuration.

logmessage.name: MISMATCH_ISSUER_IN_ASSERTION_FROM_PDP
logmessage.description: Issuer in Assertion doesn't match the Issuer in Response.

triggers.item: Error condition, Response will not be accepted.

actions.item: Check the Policy Decision Point instance to debug the cause of the problem.

logmessage.name: INVALID_SIGNATURE_ASSERTION_FROM_PDP
logmessage.description: Assertion is not signed or signature is not valid.

triggers.item: Policy Enforcement Point (PEP) provider requested the Assertion to be signed but the assertion received was not; or the signature on the Assertion received was not valid.

actions.item: Check PEP metadata configuration.
Check debug for more detailed error message.

logmessage.name: REQUEST_MESSAGE
logmessage.description: Request message from Query Requester

logmessage.name: VALID_SIGNATURE_QUERY
logmessage.description: Valid Signature in Query Request.

datainfo.item: The realm from which the metadata was retreived.
Entity Identifier for the Policy Decision Point.
Cert Alias used to retrieve certificate from keystore.

logmessage.name: SUCCESS_FED_SSO
logmessage.description: Successful federation/Single Sign On.

logmessage.name: SAE_IDP_SUCCESS
logmessage.description: SAE_IDP succeeded.

logmessage.name: SAE_IDP_ERROR
logmessage.description: SAE_IDP failed.

logmessage.name: SAE_IDP_ERROR_NODATA
logmessage.description: SAE_IDP invoked without attributes.

actions.item: Add SAE attributes to request.

logmessage.name: SAE_IDP_AUTH
logmessage.description: SAE_IDP delegated to Auth.

triggers.item: SAE_IDP invoked but no user session.

logmessage.name: SAE_SP_SUCCESS
logmessage.description: SAE_SP succeeded.

logmessage.name: SAE_SP_ERROR
logmessage.description: SAE_SP failed.

logmessage.name: SEND_ECP_RESPONSE
logmessage.description: Send a response to ECP.

datainfo.item: SOAP message string if the log level was set to LL_FINE at run time

logmessage.name: SEND_ECP_RESPONSE_FAILED
logmessage.description: Unable to send a response to ECP.

logmessage.name: CANNOT_INSTANTIATE_SOAP_MESSAGE_ECP

logmessage.name: RECEIVE_SOAP_FAULT_ECP
logmessage.description: Received a SOAP fault from ECP.

logmessage.name: CANNOT_INSTANTIATE_SOAP_MESSAGE_ECP

logmessage.name: SUCCESS_FED_TERMINATION

logmessage.description: New name identifier succeeded.

logmessage.name: UNABLE_TO_TERMINATE
